channel.title: Geoff on Software
channel.description: Recent content on Geoff on Software

item.title: About
item.description: Bio I’m seeking freedom and mastery. Freedom is the option to choose how I spend my time. I’m happy with my progress towards mastery if I’m proud of my work.

item.title: Knowledge Work Context Switching
item.description: Table of Contents Motivation Questions Raised Persever or Switch Context Switching Strategies Measuring Strategy effectiveness Conclusion Motivation I’m on Leetcode, a technical software interview practice site.
